attributes.action: Hold a referendum in England on the question of English independence.
attributes.additional_details: There is a real groundswell of feeling in England that as a country it should divest itself of the other nations that comprise the United Kingdom. This referendum would allow the people of England to indicate te strength of that view.
attributes.background: Hold an advisory referendum in England to ask all people in England if they wish to be independent of the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312765
